blogs.title: Always joyous!
blogs.body: You were the most unexpected entry to our family that bought immense joy to all of us! I will eternally love you! Thaleia xx
blogs.author: Thaleia

blogs.title: Will miss you!
blogs.body: Despite the fact that I had to fight with my sister on who would take you out three times a day for your walk, I will forever miss you! Damian
blogs.author: Damian
